channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
Okay.. I was wondering if anyone has a code for FOLLOWING. There have been many times where I just need to click 80 times to follow rather than simply clicking one button, and it is getting annoying.
Also, I was wondering if someone could tell me how to change what the log out button says in TestScape? There is a tutorial on it, but from what I could see, the tutorial only said how to change the text above the button. Then, I need to know how to get that text to stay here. Usually, the text there just carries over from other servers if I have played one in the past.
Also2, I need to know how to change NPC drops. I did the code from xerozcheez called like "NPCs drop all" and it worked fine in a previous server, but that is not what I want. Basically, I want to start the drops over from scratch, then add them in one by one. Could someone please tell me how to do this?
Thanks,
-Alexia | ++ given to anyone that helps :P

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Okay, I fixed the char command… thanks.

I am having trouble with the logout button though. I changed the text, but now I am having a problem that it will not stay like that. The text carries over from other servers.

-Alexia | Still need follow. :P[br][size=1]Posted at: October 20, 2006, 12:55:15 PM[/size][hr]What I still need:
-How do I get it so that I can use the follow button? I .
-How do I get it so that the text in the log out area stays the same for my server? The text always carries over from other servers.

  • Also, please see my other two topics: “Hosting” , “Auto-Kick” *[br][size=1]Posted at: October 20, 2006, 03:44:26 PM[/size][hr]What I still need:
    -How do I get it so that I can use the follow button? I .
    -How do I get it so that the text in the log out area stays the same for my server? The text always carries over from other servers.

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @poepx0 poepx0
item.description:
@poepx0 wrote:

don’t listen to the beggar noob

for a small fee of 200k =)
[br][size=1]Posted at: 20-10-2006, 09:57:36[/size][hr]to change the logout text,press ctr+F and search for the text what’s on it,and for the char,make a new command,becouse it also didn’t work,just make a new ::Char command under /END OF FRAME TESTING/
rep pls
EDIT: wait i found it else if(command.startsWith("char")) { showInterface(3559); }add this under /*END OF FRAME TESTING*/ ;D

Read full topic
